about_the_game:
Dive into an immersive and revitalizing experience with HealQuest, a revolutionary VR game that redefines the concept of playful physical activity. Transport yourself to a breathtaking tropical island, where idyllic landscapes invite adventure and well-being.

At the heart of HealQuest lies an innovative goal: to get moving in order to explore and interact with the environment. As you stroll through the island's winding trails, discover entry points that trigger dynamic and entertaining sports exercises. Whether performing jumps, stretches or cardio exercises, each activity is seamlessly integrated into the exploration of this paradise world.

One of the most captivating aspects of HealQuest lies in its interaction with the island's inhabitants: colorful, cheerful characters who invite you to play and progress. Forge bonds with local animals, overcome creature-specific challenges and improve your skills as you discover the island's secrets.

Thanks to visually stunning environments, total immersion in virtual reality and a variety of playfully integrated sports activities, HealQuest offers a unique gaming experience. Stimulating body and mind, this game invites players to escape on an enchanting adventure where fun, exploration and fitness meet.

Developed by the studio Voskalia, HealQuest is much more than a simple VR video game; it's an invitation to discover the pleasure of physical exercise and exploration in a heavenly setting, offering a revolutionary and refreshing gaming experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Discover a paradise island in VR with HealQuest. Trigger exercises as you explore, and play with the adorable inhabitants to progress. An immersive sports adventure awaits you.
